settings.title: Join the Hotel Collection Distributor Program
settings.subtitle: Get 50% off our selection of hotel-inspired products when you become a Hotel Collection Distributor.

settings.title: Take Your Business To The Next Level
settings.text: Apply today to partner with one of the industry's fastest-growing lifestyle brands. Speak to a Hotel Collection Business Consultant to learn more.

settings.heading: Double Your Investment
settings.subheading:
As a Hotel Collection distributor, you will have the opportunity to double your investment by leveraging the products of a world-renowned lifestyle brand that is beloved by celebrities
and retailers alike.

settings.heading: Improve Your Customer Retention
settings.subheading:
By offering your customers products that allow them to transform their homes into the destination of their dreams, you can improve customer retention while increasing your revenue
and sell-through rates.

settings.heading: Exclusive Wholesale Prices
settings.subheading: Joining our distribution network will enable you to get exclusive wholesale prices and opportunities to expand your business.

settings.title: Become a Hotel Collection Distributor and discover endless possibilities.
settings.subtitle: Elevate your storefront or e-commerce site with our curated line of luxury products.
settings.review_content:
“My clients love Hotel Collection! Since incorporating the products in my showroom,
I’ve seen a huge increase in sales and retention.”

settings.question: Interested in becoming a wholesaler or retailer with us?
settings.answer:
The luxury of becoming a distributor with us is that you get to carry Hotel Collection in your store. Whether you own a storefront or e-commerce site, we welcome you to apply to our wholesale program. All Hotel Collection products (excluding the Interactive Scenting Kiosk) are available for wholesale. Prior to applying to our program, please note that there is a $1,000 order minimum. An order value below that amount will not qualify for checkout. 

If you are interested in purchasing diffusers and oils, the order minimum is $2,500 and requires a Scent Consultant appointment in order to make a purchase. Please submit a request to speak with a Scent Consultant.

settings.question: What are Hotel Collection Candles made from?
settings.answer: All of our candles are curated using a soy-blend wax and are 100% non-toxic, vegan, and cruelty-free. Each candle is hand-poured in our Miami warehouse with the finest oil concentrations and 100% lead-free cotton wicks.

settings.question: What features do Hotel Collection Diffusers have?
settings.answer:
All Hotel Collection Scent Diffusers offer customizable fragrance intensity and automatically turn off when the timer is up or oil runs out.

Our two larger models, the Penthouse Scent
Diffuser and Villa Scent Diffuser, boast a built-in
fan for consistent coverage, security lock for the fragrance compartment, and programmable weekly timer that allows up to five unique operating periods. The Villa Scent Diffuser is our hybrid unit; it can operate as a stand-alone diffuser, or be connected to the HVAC for whole-home scenting.

settings.question: What is a Hotel Collection fragrance oil?
settings.answer:
Hotel Collection fragrance oils are made from a blend of therapeutic-grade essential oils and perfume-quality fragrance oils, designed to mimic the notes
of your favorite hotel scents. They are designed to maintain all the therapeutic benefits of essential oils and provide maximum versatility and control of the scenting environment

settings.question: Do you offer private labeling?
settings.answer: The wholesale program does not offer private labeling at this time.

settings.question: Is there an initial investment/start-up cost?
settings.answer: No, there is no start-up cost or sign up fee.

settings.question: What types of businesses can start doing wholesale?
settings.answer: Any business can join our wholesale program. Many of our existing wholesale accounts own businesses like Spas, Gyms, Salons, Real Estate Offices, and Medical Establishments.

settings.question: Do I have to maintain inventory? Do you offer dropshipping?
settings.answer: Wholesale customers must buy the products on the wholesale website and then resell to their clients. Since we do not offer dropshipping, you will have to maintain inventory from your end. Please note that Hotel Collection is not responsible for shipping costs.

settings.question: Do I need a storefront or can this be done online-only?
settings.answer: You may sell either in store or on your e-commerce platform. Please note, Hotel Collection Wholesale accounts are not allowed to sell on third-party retailers.

settings.question: Can I sell on third-party retailing sites like Amazon?
settings.answer: No. As part of the Wholesale program, selling on third-party retailers such as Amazon, is strictly prohibited and a violation to the Wholesale agreement. Hotel Collection reserves the right to disable or permanently remove access to any Wholesale account who is found selling our products on third-party retailing sites, including but not limited to Amazon.

settings.question: Can I distribute/run my wholesale account internationally?
settings.answer: Yes, we welcome international distributors to apply. While we permit international wholesale, please note that Hotel Collection is not responsible for the shipping costs to international warehouses.

settings.question: Can I wholesale for my Airbnb? Vacation rentals?
settings.answer: Of course! Scenting your vacation home will elevate your client's experience during their stay

settings.question: Can I be a distributor to my friends?
settings.answer: Yes, we invite you to sell to friends and family to elevate their scenting experience. We permit the use of social media and marketplaces, as well as at flea market booths.

settings.question: What is a Hotel Collection fragrance oil?
settings.answer: Our signature Fragrance Oils are a blend of therapeutic-grade essential oils and perfume-quality fragrance oils, designed to mimic the notes of your favorite hotel scents. 100% Free of all Parabens, Formaldehyde, Color Additives, Synthetic Dyes, and Preservatives. Our Vegan formulas are derived from plant-based ingredients & sustainably-sourced essential oils.

settings.newsletter_title: Stay up to date with Hotel Collection.
